flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200.0>>200.0
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 200.0 = <<1000+200.0=1200.0>>1200.0
He takes out $600 because 1200.0 / 2 = <<1200.0/2=600.0>>600.0
After this it has $600 in it because 1200.0 - 600.0 = <<1200.0-600.0=600.0>>600.0
She earns $90 in interest because 600.0 x 0.15 = <<600.0*0.15=90.0>>90.0
The account now has $609.0 because 600.0 + 90.0 = <<600.0+90.0=609.0>>609.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 690.0, not 609.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
